text.div:
Bench

OPERATION: Bench

The bench operation reads resources from the database and extracts and stores search parameters according to the latest configuration of the server.

URL: [base]/$bench

Parameters

UseNameCardinalityTypeBindingDocumentation
OUTreturn1..1OperationOutcome

If the operation outcome does not list any errors, then the server expected to be healthy.

name: bench
description: The bench operation performs busy work on the server CPU.

parameter.name: threads
parameter.documentation: The number of threads to exercise.

parameter.name: size
parameter.documentation: The size of the jobs to perform.
